basic_information.scholarship_name: Panera Bread Liberal Arts Student Organization President Scholarship

description: This scholarship recognizes the outstanding leadership and effort of a Liberal Arts student organization president. Must be nominated by CLA faculty to apply. Eligibility Requirements Liberal Arts Major Minimum 3.0 GPA Served at least one term as a president of a Liberal Arts organization Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
